section.para: You can give me feedback in different ways:

listitem.para: Bugtracker:http://saigkill.ddns.net:8112/dashboard. There you can place bug reports and feature requests.

Review board:http://saigkill.ddns.net:8080/publicancreators/view. If you are an programmer you can help with reviewing my code. If you know ways to make it better, just let me know. So i can learn from it.
OpenHub:https://www.openhub.net/p/PublicanCreators. OpenHub is a statistics provider for open source projects. There you can set yourself as user.
Openhatch:http://openhatch.org/projects/PublicanCreators. Its a community builder tool. Just browse to it.

section.para: Also you are invited to visit my blog onhttp://saigkill.github.io.
